thread.title: Mericathryn E. Polius
thread.title_full: Yaniv & Associates, PC reviewed by Mericathryn E. Polius

author: Mericathryn E. Polius
title: Mericathryn E. Polius
text:
When I decided to search for an Attorney, I went online first. I was so
skeptical about the process because so many companies are not legitimate.
Yaniv & Associates were trustworthy and they had a reputable service over a long period of time. This was a plus. The ease of being able to do everything without even entering a court room was so very helpful.
I have already told quite a few people about Yaniv & Associates.
I would recommend them over and over again.
